examples.example: 在欢乐的聚会上，大家一起举杯干杯，庆祝这美好的时刻。

translate.english: At the joyful party, everyone raises their glasses and toasts together to celebrate this wonderful moment.

examples.example: 朋友们相聚一堂，共同举杯干杯，祝愿彼此未来一切顺利。

translate.english: Friends gather together, raise glasses and toast together, and wish each other all the best for the future.

examples.example: 当我们完成了这个重要项目时，大家开心地举杯干杯，共享成功的喜悦。

translate.english: When we finished this important project, everyone happily raised their glasses to toast and shared the joy of success.
